productsMain.title: THE THREEFOLD ECOSYSTEM
productsMain.subtitle: The ThreeFold Grid is launching it's 3rd release soon, representing the greatest leap towards a peer-to-peer world. Innovative organizations and developers have already started building on this revolutionary infrastructure. Check out these examples:

productData.content: TAG connects thousands of teachers and millions of students around one purpose: climate action.

cta2.content: We are not a company, but more like humans helping other humans. Our mission is bold and motivates every step we take.

cta4.title: is the
cta4.subtitle: the threefold grid
cta4.content:
Welcome to a better internet. Data is not decentralized and distributed to the world's
largest Peer-to-Peer grid,allowing you to truly be the master of you digital identity.

cta5.content:
<!-- button2: Spread our Message
link: ''
button3: Join our Community
link: '' -->

featuresMain2.title: Introducing 3Node
featuresMain2.content: Work with technology that can change the world. 3Nodes run Zero OS, a stateless and lightweight operating system that is setting new standards of security and efficiency to store humanity's data and run its workloads.

features2.title: Decentralize the internet
features2.content: Bring capacity to new locations. No larger than a shoebox, the 3Node fits inside any home or office.

features2.title: Make Data Safe
features2.content: Give people unbreakable storage for their data, while they keep full ownership and access rights.

features2.title: Connect the world
features2.content: Enable a more accessible, affordable, and sustainable Internet by creating shorter bridges between people and capacity.

features2.title: Earn Income
features2.content: Simply plug in your 3Node to electricity and network, and start earning ThreeFold Tokens.

comparisonMain.title: GIVE THE WORLD A BETTER INTERNET
comparisonMain.description: The current Internet is centralized to tech giants that build power-hungry data centers and exploit user data. ThreeFold looks at updating the current $3.9 Billion IT with a new paradigm that serves people and our planet.

comparisonSecs.title: IT IS SUSTAINABLE
comparisonSecs.content: We must rethink our resource consumption if we want to save our planet.

brandPanel.title: ZERO OS
brandPanel.content: An autonomous open-source operating system that supports the peer-to-peer cloud and the deployment of inﬁnitely scalable digital workloads with unparalleled levels of security and privacy.

brandPanel2.title: THE THREEFOLD GRID IS THE ONLY TRUE SOLUTION
brandPanel2.content:
We did what nobody else has done. We rebuilt the architecture from the ground up – a unique stateless operating system and an automation layer to remove all intermediaries and enable anyone to connect hardware, anywhere around the world. A real, long-lasting solution, not just a bandaid approach.


Without the ThreeFold Grid, the peer-to-peer Internet the world needs is not possible.

videoPanel.title: More than an Internet, a new paradigm
videoPanel.content: ThreeFold started from the ground up to build secure and sustainable peer-to-peer Internet infrastructure and technologies that can scale anywhere and empower you, your business and your community with data sovereignty.

partenershipsMain.title: Our partners build a better tomorrow
partenershipsMain.content: ThreeFold exists for humanity to thrive, while regenerating our planet. We provide the foundation for people and projects that help to build a better world – whether they have moonshot visions or down-to-earth ambitions. We aren’t the hero of our story. They are.

partnerships.title: Empowering Global Education

partnerships.content: Today, education remains inaccessible for millions of children around the world. This is not fair. By partnering with Take Action Global, we will bring local Internet capacity to developing regions, and build educational platforms that empower the forgotten leaders of tomorrow.

partnerships.title: Bringing Fair Data to Farmers

partnerships.content: Current supply chain models can be complicated and easily mismanaged, and they often exploit farmers and producers. Through our collaboration with Solidaridad, ThreeFold’s autonomous and secure technology will bring veriﬁability to data and create transparent supply chains.

team.title: The Team
team.content: The ThreeFold Foundation is a not-for-proﬁt that expands the potential of ThreeFold Tech’s open-source technology. We are headquartered in Belgium, Dubai and Egypt, and have remote teams all around the world. Our team has worked on Internet storage and cloud technology since the ‘90s, and has earned world records for creating the most advanced infrastructures. We aim to create a peer-to-peer Internet and cloud that can host all of humanity’s digital workloads via smart contracts and run on a fully autonomous infrastructure without the need for traditional IT.
